items.sentence: Money spent on your children's education is usually money well spent.

I'm not so sure that I like Mary as much as the first time I saw her.
Tom didn't want to hold Mary's hand, but she asked him to, so he did.
I've never been abroad, but I'm now planning a trip around the world.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary is going to do this afternoon.
I don't think that I've ever heard Tom complain about Mary's cooking.
Tom wants to ask what Mary has been doing, but he knows he shouldn't.
Sometimes it's just best to avoid topics that might be controversial.
Have you thought about what time of year you want to visit Australia?
There are several good restaurants within walking distance from here.
